articles.title: DPRK's Greatest Jubilees to Be Commemorated in Oceanian Region
Vice-President of SPA Presidium Meets Russian Delegation
articles.content:
Vice-President of SPA Presidium Meets Russian Delegation 
   Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly conversation with the delegation of the Russian Center for International Scientific and Cultural Cooperation headed by Chairwoman Eleonora Mitrofanova at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Friday.
 Present there were Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairwoman of the Korea-Russia Friendship Association, and Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Andrei Karlov.

articles.title: Protocol on Scientific and Technical Cooperation between DPRK and Malaysia Signed
articles.content:
Protocol on Scientific and Technical Cooperation between DPRK and Malaysia Signed 
   Pyongyang, November 24 (KCNA) -- A protocol of the 1st meeting of the joint committee on scientific and technical cooperation between the governments of the DPRK and Malaysia was signed here today.
 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were Ri Ui Gu, vice-president of the State Academy of Sciences, officials concerned and from the opposite side were members of the Malaysian delegation of the Ministry of Scientific and Technical Innovation led by Deputy Secretary General Alihan Bin Abdul Hamid and Malaysian Charge d'Affaires Ad Interim here Jamal Sharifuddin Bin Johan.    
 The protocol was signed by the vice-president and the deputy secretary general.
